mapper.select: SELECT A.RN, A.NOTICE_NO, A.NOTICE_TITLE, A.NOTICE_CONTENT, A.NOTICE_HIT, A.NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, A.NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, A.ID FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC) AS RN, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HIT, NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, ID FROM NOTICE) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE (NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_HIT, NOTICE_CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, ID) VALUES (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, 0, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d'), DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%y/%m/%d'), #{id})
